title: Focus on uppers
creator_credit: Noel Nosseck, American Educational Films, Avanti Films and Directions Unlimited
brief_description: This film illustrates the dangerous effects of amphetamines on the body. Explains that unlike other pills they do not put the body’s functions in order but rather cause users to overextend themselves to the point of physical and emotional exhaustion. Narrated by Greg Morris.
creator_credit_for_label: Noel Nosseck, American Educational Films, Avanti Films and Directions Unlimited
